about_the_game:
World Empire 2027 demo version
The demo version has only the easy difficulty level, no scenarios and you can select only 4 countries.
This version will allow you to test the game before deciding to buy it.

When you buy the full version it will contain:
* All 180 countries.
* Normal, Hard, Very Hard, Impossible, Custom sandbox mode, risk mode, zombie's mode and unlimited money option.
* Option to play online with players from around the world.
* 13 Extra spy missions.
* 12 Extra war actions.
* 5 Extra technologies.
* 4 Extra diplomacy options.
* 8 Extra United Nations options.
* 29 Worldwide scenarios.
* Generals selection.
* More to come :)

We plan to improve the game a lot and for this we need our players' support.
Our plan is to add many new options including improving the interface and graphics.

Add countless new scenarios, diplomacy, spy, war options, weapons, technologies, factories, resources...
Also we plan online multiplayer mode.
The more support we will get from our players the more we will do.
Your support is important to us to continue developing.
Thank you,
iGindis Team
